## Release (2024-07-19)

#### :rocket: Enhancement
* `@hokulea/ember`

#### :bug: Bug Fix
* `@hokulea/core`
  * [#183](https://github.com/hokulea/hokulea/pull/183) fix menu visibility for app-header ([@gossi](https://github.com/gossi))
